languages.text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.
languages.original_text: Черные корабли полнятся отчаяньем множества псайкеров. Ведь они знают, что эти корабли — не более чем тюрьмы, везущие их навстречу весьма мрачной судьбе.

traits.locale_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

languages.text: Черные корабли полнятся отчаяньем множества псайкеров. Ведь они знают, что эти корабли — не более чем тюрьмы, везущие их навстречу весьма мрачной судьбе.

Die Schwarzen Schiffe selbst sind dunkle Orte der Verzweiflung, denn sie sind kaum mehr als Hochsicherheitsgefängnisse, und viele der transportierten Psioniker wissen genau, dass sie am Ende ihrer Reise ein grausames Schicksal erwartet.
languages.original_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

traits.locale_text: Die Schwarzen Schiffe selbst sind dunkle Orte der Verzweiflung, denn sie sind kaum mehr als Hochsicherheitsgefängnisse, und viele der transportierten Psioniker wissen genau, dass sie am Ende ihrer Reise ein grausames Schicksal erwartet.

languages.text: Les Vaisseaux Noirs sont des lieux sombres où règne le désespoir, car ils ne sont guère plus que des prisons de haute sécurité, et une bonne partie des psykers qu'ils transportent savent pertinemment qu'ils connaîtront un sort funeste au terme de leur voyage.
languages.original_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

traits.locale_text: Les Vaisseaux Noirs sont de sombres lieux de désespoir, car ils s'apparente à des prisons de haute sécurité, et nombre de psykers qui y sont transportés savent pertinemment qu'ils connaîtront un sinistre destin à la fin de leur voyage.

languages.text: 黑船是充满了绝望的黑暗之地，每艘黑船都相当于高度戒备的监狱。被黑船押送的灵能者非常清楚，一旦黑船抵达终点，他们便会面临严峻的命运。
languages.original_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

traits.locale_text: 黑船是充满了绝望的黑暗之地，每艘黑船都相当于高度戒备的监狱。被黑船押送的灵能者非常清楚，一旦黑船抵达终点，他们便会面临严峻的命运。

languages.text: 〈黒き御船〉そのものが厳重な警備の刑務所に過ぎないという絶望の暗い場所であり、移送される異能者（サイカー）たちは、旅の終わりには悲惨な運命が待っていることを理解している。
languages.original_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.

traits.locale_text: 〈黒き御船〉そのものが厳重な警備の刑務所に過ぎないという絶望の暗い場所であり、移送される異能者（サイカー）たちは、旅の終わりには悲惨な運命が待っていることを理解している。

languages.text: La Naves Negras son en sí mismas cuchitriles en los que campa la desesperación, pues no son más que prisiones de alta seguridad. Muchos de los psíquicos que son trasladados allí saben perfectamente que les aguarda un lúgubre sino al término de su viaje.
languages.original_text: The Black Ships themselves are dark places of despair, for they are little more than high-security prisons, and many of the psykers being transported know full well that they will meet a grim fate at their journey's end.
